title: Charged particle moves near wire with current

content.question: A negative charge â€“q is moving with a velocity v to the right, parallel to a wire that is carrying a current I to the right, as shown above. The direction of the force on the charge due to the magnetic field produced by the wire is

choices.label: toward the top of the page
toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: toward the top of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
